import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { DataContext } from '../pages/_app'; import { Fade } from 'react-reveal'; import Section from './Section'; import Image from './Image'; const Statistics = () => { const { labels, statistics } = useContext(DataContext); const { image, totalGamesCount, totalGoalsCount, totalAssistsCount, totalTrophiesCount } = statistics return (
{ reveal => ( <>
{ labels.played }
{ totalGamesCount }
{ labels.games }
{ labels.scored }
{ totalGoalsCount } { labels.goals }
{ labels.won }
{ totalTrophiesCount } { labels.trophies }
{ labels.made }
{ totalAssistsCount } { labels.assists }
) }
) } export default Statistics;
